thread.section_title: KISA Phone Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of KISA Phone | kisaphone.com.au
thread.title: Helen Cunningham
thread.title_full: KISA Phone reviewed by Helen Cunningham

author: Helen Cunningham
title: Helen Cunningham
text: My dad has alzheimers and is he now calls us regularly. He's not so good at answering the phone though. He is from the non technology generation and has rarely ever used or spoke on a phone. I think having our pictures with our names next to the pictures is a fantastic prompt for his memory. Mum always made the calls till her death. Now my father has to make the challenge of using a phone. I get about 4 phone calls a week. The kisa phone has made this possible.. E very other phone on the market was way to technical for him to deal with.
